title: Snowdown Shop this year??
body: I have a question, is there gonna be a snowdown shop this year? where u get sales up to 70%. I was just wondering i  shoulld save some rp for the Snowdown shop. So, please tell me . Thanks Riot

replies.body:
I haven't seen an announcement and because Snowdown is more than halfway over at this point, I wouldn't count on a shop coming out this year, in my opinion. Keep an eye on the [**News Page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/), though!

Let me know if you have any other questions!
Can you clarify what you mean? I don't understand what you're asking. :/
He's wondering if there was a Snowdown Shop and he missed it, I think.
